    • Method Detail

      • UseItem

        public void UseItem(LivingCreature target)
        Calculates the amount that target.currentHitPoints should be changed by item use, then applies change

        amountToChange is calculated as target.getMaximumHitPoints multiplied by {@code healPercentage}

        Specified by:
        UseItem in class UsableItem
        Parameters:
        target - the livingCreature to be affected
